user_query: I want to analyze recent whale transactions for Ethereum, Ripple, and Zcash, and provide details of a specific transaction.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest huge whale transactions for Ethereum.
Fetch the latest huge whale transactions for Ripple.
Fetch the latest huge whale transactions for Zcash.
Fetch the details of the specific transaction with hash 'ac6f1a0b388e2814f2e2036c7c81524cfae7e3432a8e503fe5d07ebb453ee310' for the symbol 'btc'.
